description: A bar and harness to attach a sufficiently large creature to a wheeled vehicle, allowing them to pull it along.

Heavy steel beams and harness to attach a sufficiently large creature to a wheeled vehicle, allowing them to pull it along, reinforced to withstand the rigors of the apocalypse and ill-advised off-roading.  You would still need separate armor for said creature to wear.
//: calculating weight: yoke_harness (1000g) + frame (20 000g) + scrap (50g)x35 OR steel_lump(1000g)x5 + pipe(1250g)x2 + chain(3628)x2. Total 1: 32506g. Total 2: 35756g. With rounding and fudge factor: 35000g. Previus eyeballed guess before doing any of this math was 30000g.
